snippet: Turning Point: Brett Ziegler, a photographer based in Washington, D.C., was inspired by Alex Webb, a Magnum photographer.
abstract: Turning Point: Brett Ziegler, a photographer based in Washington, D.C., was inspired by Alex Webb, a Magnum photographer.
lead_paragraph: Brett Ziegler is an assistant photo editor and photographer for U.S. News and World Report in Washington, D.C. Born in California and a graduate of the Brooks Institute of Photography, he previously interned for the Ventura County Star. Mr. Ziegler, 28, spoke with Kerri MacDonald for Turning Point. Their conversation has been edited.

headline.main: With Light and Lines, Framing a Moment
